answers.answer: Has she mentioned why she wants you to have a c-section? Of have you asked?

question: So I am 35+3 and have gestational diabetes. I will be getting induced on my 37th or 38th week however I do want to try for a natural no pain med vaginal birth. I have told my Dr this. Yet every time I see her she keeps suggesting and seems to be trying to persuade me to do a c section. It's really annoying and I'm getting very upset. Why will she not respect my wishes.
title: kinda ticked off
